Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer erred in finding misrepresentation under paragraph 40(1)(a)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant initially misrepresented employment history, clarified during interview but deemed insufficient
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Employment history documentation and applicant testimony
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misrepresentation of material facts in application
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness of officer's interpretation and application of law
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Misrepresentation was adopted prior to correction and could induce administrative error
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Paragraph 40(1)(a), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: False employment history submitted in application
Crimes.Application_Factor: Withholding or misrepresenting material facts related to employment
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Timing and credibility of correction during interview
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Opportunity to clarify during interview provided
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Initial false claim of employment experience
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that misrepresentation was corrected before decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timing of correction relative to decision

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer erred in finding misrepresentation under paragraph 40(1)(a)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant admitted falsely claiming work experience as a computer programmer
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: False claim of professional work experience
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness of officer's interpretation and application of law
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Misrepresentation was made and relied upon before being corrected
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Paragraph 40(1)(a), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Falsely claimed work experience as a computer programmer
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Permanent resident visa refused; inadmissible for two years
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: False claim of work experience as computer programmer
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Admission of falsity during interview after initial submission
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Intentional false claim of professional qualifications
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Correction made during interview prior to decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timing and effect of correction on misrepresentation finding
